comments.comment: Why guys u can't understand he is in jail bcz to protect the peace in country...when he was he always tried to make problems between Buddhists and muslims but not for a good course.I have seen his videos he behaves not like a matured decent person..he behaves like a rowdi..so obviously we all know if he will release he will definitely start everything allover again and we will have unnecessary problems in the country..please don't get me wrong I want everyone in this country to be happy and to live in peace.but I see most of sri lankan think inside a frame they don't want to be open minded they always strickly stick im to their opinions..untill u guys start loving ur neighbour and ppl around u no matter what their religion we will never find peace between each other..
comments.author: Aisha Fathima

replies.replyComment:
Our ancestors loved every one.	When muslims first came to Sri Lanka,	king Senarath gave them villages to settle.	When Portuguese attacked muslims,	kandian kings shifted them to  safe places in trincomali.	King Dutugemunu the great let the remainning tamil soldiers and their families to settle here 2nd century bc.		But whenever Europeans attack Sinhalese,	muslims (then)and tamils supported them.	But most of the Sinhalese still love other ethanic groups.I personally have many muslim friends.
We don't fight against anyone innocent.	Thero was against the inequality politicians show to Sinhalese and others.	Thero was against the menance done by muslim/tamil extremists. But he was no extremist.	 	Whenever we witness inequality infront of our eyes we don't stay like dumbass dogs .	We fight against it,Yet	being far better than ISIS
